definition: type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young

sentences.english: "Seven-word song" is one of the major tunes in Taiwanese Opera.
sentences.chinese: 是歌仔戏唱腔中最主要的曲调。

sentences.english: The first chapter, a brief summary of the Gezi Opera and its living environment.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，对歌仔戏及其生存环境作简要概括。

definition: Gaojia opera of Fujian and Taiwan
variety of opera popular in southern Fujian and Taiwan
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
Kunqu opera, influential musical theater originating in Kunshan, Jiangsu province in Yuan times
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
